summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning to implement the Seattle Cascade Mixed zone, amending Sections: 23.30.010; 23.41.004; 23.41.012; 23.47.036; 23.47.038; 23.53.010; 23.53.015; 23.53.030; 23.54.015; 23.54.020; 23.54.030; 23.55.030; and 23.84.009 of Title 23 of the Seattle Municipal Code; adding Sections: 23.34.126; and 23.34.128; and a new Chapter 23.48 to Title 23 of the Seattle Municipal Code; and amending the Official Land Use Map, Section 23.32.016.
